title: Episode #1: We Who Are Alive and Remain
description: In the inaugural episode of the Art of Manliness podcast we talk to Marcus Brotherton, author of We Who Are Alive and Remain: Untold Stories From the Band of Brothers. Marcus shares his insights about the men who fought in the 101st Airborne Division during World War II and what lessons men today can take from the Band of Brothers.
author: contact@artofmanliness.com (The Art of Manliness)
